Traits.Name: Flying
Traits.Description: Ignores all terrain and terrain effects other than impassable terrain, and ignores engagement and obstruction.

Actions.Name: Spirit Away
Actions.Description: The Hob swaps places with a character in range 2, teleporting both. If either character cannot teleport, this move cannot be made.

Actions.Name: Playful Pricking
Actions.Description: A character in range 6 of the spirit must save or become marked. While marked, each time they teleport 1 space or more, they take 1 piercing damage. This damage cannot reduce them past 1 hp.

Actions.Name: Thorny Thicket
Actions.Description: The spirit creates a line 3 area of dangerous terrain in range 6.
